mapper.select: SELECT A.hist_seq AS "histSeq", A.voc_seq AS "vocSeq", A.hist_type_cd AS "histTypeCd", fn_getCodeNm('COM999', 'HIST_TYPE_CD', A.hist_type_cd) AS "histTypeNm", A.hist_cont AS "histCont", A.reg_user_no AS "regUserNo", fn_getUserNm(A.reg_user_no) AS "regUserNm", date_format(A.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "regDt" FROM tb_voc_hist A inner join tb_voc_mst B on A.voc_seq = B.voc_seq WHERE A.voc_seq = #{vocSeq} ORDER BY A.hist_seq DESC

SELECT A.hist_seq AS "histSeq", A.voc_seq AS "vocSeq", A.hist_type_cd AS "histTypeCd", fn_getCodeNm('COM999', 'HIST_TYPE_CD', A.hist_type_cd) AS "histTypeNm", A.hist_cont AS "histCont", A.reg_user_no AS "regUserNo", fn_getUserNm(A.reg_user_no) AS "regUserNm", date_format(A.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "regDt" FROM tb_voc_hist A inner join tb_voc_mst B on A.voc_seq = B.voc_seq WHERE A.hist_seq = #{histSeq}
